indicators.name: Change in estimated malaria incidence (2020 – 2024)
indicators.formula: [(New malaria incidence - Original malaria incidence) / (original incidence) ] x 100

indicators.name: Change in estimated malaria mortality (2020 – 2024)
indicators.formula: [(New malaria mortality - Original malaria mortality) / (original incidence) ] x 100

indicators.name: Change in estimated malaria cases treated and cured (2020 – 2024)
indicators.formula: [(New malaria cases treated and cured - Original malaria cases treated and cured) / (original incidence) ] x 100

indicators.name: % of nets distributed
indicators.formula: [(number of nets distributed) / (number of nets received) ] x 100

indicators.name: % of fever cases tested with RDT
indicators.formula: [(Number of fever cases tested with RDT microscopy) / (Total number of fever cases received) ] x 100

indicators.name: % pregnant women provided IPTp at more than 12 week gestational age
indicators.formula: [(Number of pregnant women with IPTp at more than 12 week gestational age) / (Total number of pregnant women at ANC1) ] x 100

indicators.name: % pregnant women receiving IPT x 2 only
indicators.formula: [(Number of pregnant women with IPTp x 2 only) / (Total number of pregnant women at ANC2) ] x 100

indicators.name: % pregnant women receiving IPT x 3
indicators.formula: [(Number of pregnant women with IPTp x 3) / (Total number of pregnant women at ANC3) ] x 100

indicators.name: % of malaria confirmed cases treated with first-line antimalarial treatment according to national policy
indicators.formula: [(Number of malaria cases confirmed treated with first line antimalarial treatment according to national policy) / (Number of malaria cases confirmed) ] x 100

indicators.name: % of severe malaria cases referred for treatment
indicators.formula: [(Number of severe malaria cases referred for treatment) / (Total number of severe malaria cases) ] x 100

indicators.name: % of health facilities with stock out
indicators.formula: [(Number of health facilities with stock out) / (Total number of health facilities) ] x 100

indicators.name: Number of days of ACT stock out
Number of days of SP stock out
Number of days of Nets stock out

indicatorGroup.titre: Taux de cas téstés positifs par RDT (%)

indicatorGroup.titre: Proportion de cas paludisme grave référé (%)

indicatorGroup.titre: Proportion de cas de paludisme simple confirmés traités (%)

indicatorGroup.name: Prévention CSB
indicatorGroup.titre: Proportion de patients ayant reçu des services de prévention (%)

indicatorGroup.name: Gestion des intrants CSB
indicatorGroup.titre: Taux de disponibilité de produits et médicaments paludisme (%)

indicatorGroup.name: Décès dus au paludisme CHRD
indicatorGroup.titre: Proportion de cas de décès pour paludisme (%)
